fields.summary: Add option for applications to register a custom server selector

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Add option for applications to register a custom server selector

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*+Objective+*
* Understand if replacement of AdS (AdSense for search) with AFSh (AdSense for shopping) can generate incremental revenue.
* Understand if engagement gets affected by AFSh

*+Implementation+*
* Remove 1 AdSense from sponsored links at the bottom and add in 1 AFSh between 5th and 6th organic result using AFSh (marktplaats example); if there is less then 6 result, we don't call for ASFh.
* Targeted page type - SRP but Search only and not browse
* Send search term typed by user as query to google

*+Targeted categories+*
* Home & Garden (ID = 9175)
* Electronics (ID = 9178)
* Sports & Leisure (ID = 9179)
* Fashion (ID = 9177)
* Baby & Kids (ID = 9176)
* Others (ID = 0)

*+Channel ID to implemented in testing group+*
* 2_M_9175_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_9175_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_9175_SRL_3100000_1
* 2_M_9178_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_9178_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_9178_SRL_3100000_1
* 2_M_9179_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_9179_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_9179_SRL_3100000_1
* 2_M_9177_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_9177_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_9177_SRL_3100000_1
* 2_M_9176_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_9176_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_9176_SRL_3100000_1
* 2_M_0_SRL_3100001_1
* 2_M_0_SRL_3100003_1
* 2_M_0_SRL_3100000_1
* Channel ID reference - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LVJBYERNvaL1sTXy2ZrPe-KLTveZL2C86r6GtPjOGkM/edit#gid=0

*+AB testing set-up+*
* Experimental traffic - selected categories doing search only
* Control group - current set-up
* Testing group - AFSh set-up
fields.summary: Add option for applications to register a custom server selector

comments.body: [~ropetrescu] AFSh AB testing ticket for Mobile.

[~jseverins][~leslava] please refer to "Channel ID to implemented in testing group". Can you confirm that we will have those channel IDs implemented for both AdSense for search and AdSense for shopping on the testing group pages.
Couldn't do it ourselves - but reached out to Google (you are CCd in e-mail). Will confirm here once it is uploaded.

[~jseverins] Â [~leslava], Cannot load the iframe:

!image-2018-05-02-15-34-25-295.png!

Maybe there are some settings that *`Google Publisher Toolbar`* need to change?

would you please help me to confirm with that?
[~jseverins]  Our work could speed up upon your help.  Really appreciate it.

items.fromString:
*+Objective+*
* Understand if replacement of AdS (AdSense for search) with AFSh (AdSense for shopping) can generate incremental revenue.
* Understand if engagement gets affected by AFSh

*+Implementation+*
* Remove 1 AdSense from sponsored links at the bottom and add in 2 AFSh below 15th organic result using AFSh (marktplaats example); if there is less than 15th organic result but more than 11, we place after the last organic result; if there is less then 11 result, we don't call for ASFh.
* Targeted page type - SRP but Search only and not browse

*+Targeted categories+*
* Home & Garden (ID = 9175)
* Electronics (ID = 9178)
* Sports & Leisure (ID = 9179)
* Fashion (ID = 9177)
* Baby & Kids (ID = 9176)

*+Channel ID selected+*
* 
* Channel ID reference - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LVJBYERNvaL1sTXy2ZrPe-KLTveZL2C86r6GtPjOGkM/edit#gid=0

*+AB testing set-up+*
* Experimental traffic - selected categories doing search only
* Control group - current set-up
* Testing group - AFSh set-up
